  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_99349</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_99349</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Harvest percentage of crops in Europe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ernteprozentsatz der Getreide in Europa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pourcentage de moisson des collectes en Europe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Porcentagem da colheita das colheitas em Europa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Percentuale della raccolta dei raccolti in 
Europa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποσοστό συγκομιδών των συγκομιδών στην Ευρώπη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Porcentaje de la cosecha de cosechas en Europa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This bar chart shows what percentage of the crops in Europe gets harvested for food and what percentage is lost due to pests, plant diseases and weeds.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crops</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Europe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">harvest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Pests</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plant diseases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Weeds</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Balkendiagramm zeigt, welcher Prozentsatz 
der Getreide in Europa für Nahrung geerntet erhält und welcher 
Prozentsatz an den Plagen, an den Betriebskrankheiten und an den 
Unkräutern verlorenes liegt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme à barres montre quel pourcentage des
collectes en Europe obtient moissonné pour la nourriture et quel 
pourcentage est dû détruit aux parasites, aux maladies d'usine et 
aux mauvaises herbes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta carta de barra mostra que porcentagem das 
colheitas em Europa começa colhida para o alimento e que porcentagem 
é  perdido devido aos pests, às doenças de planta e às ervas 
daninhas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo diagramma a colonna mostra che percentuale
dei raccolti in Europa ottiene raccolta per alimento e che percentuale
è perso dovuto i parassiti, le malattie delle piante e le erbacce.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το ιστόγραμμα εμφανίζει ποιο ποσοστό των 
συγκομιδών στην Ευρώπη παίρνει συγκομισμένο για τα τρόφιμα και 
ποιο ποσοστό χάνεται λόγω στα παράσιτα, τις ασθένειες 
εγκαταστάσεων και τα ζιζάνια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta carta de barra muestra qué porcentaje de 
las cosechas en Europa consigue cosechado para el alimento y qué 
porcentaje es perdido debido a los parásitos, a las enfermedades de 
planta y a las malas hierbas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Getreide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Europa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ernte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Plagen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betriebskrankheiten</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Unkräuter</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les maladies d'usine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mauvaises herbes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colheitas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Europa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colheita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pests</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">doenças de planta</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
